column1: mrs. beulah j. huggins| mrs. beulah j. huggins age 85
column3: florida. passed away quietly on tuesday
column5: 2015 at west palm hospital following an extended illness. mrs. huggins was a homemaker privately for many years. she leaves to mourn her passing her loving and devoted children; kelvin c. (nadine) blount
column12: nine great-grandchildren and a host of many other relatives and sorrowing friends. homegoing services will be held saturday
column14: 2015 at 10:00 a. m. at timothy e. kitchens funeral home chapel. friends may call on friday
column16: 2015 from 6 - 8 p. m. at the chapel mentioned above. internment at evergreen cemetery.
